resources.string: Are you sure you want to skip location services? Turning location on provides deals in your area and for items on your list.
Please enable access to Location from Settings.
Allow read camera and storage access
Without camera and storage permission we are unable to get photo. Go ahead and grant permission.

camera and storage permission is disable, so please enable it.
